verses.roman:
prabhu kahe,--pūrvāśrame teṅha mora bhrātā
jagannātha miśra--pūrvāśrame mora pitā

synonyms: prabhu kahe—the Lord replied; pūrva-āśrame—in My previous āśrama; teṅha—He; mora bhrātā—My brother; jagannātha miśra—Jagannātha Miśra; pūrva-āśrame—in My previous āśrama; mora pitā—My father.
translation: Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu said, "In My previous āśrama, Śaṅkarāraṇya was My brother and Jagannātha Miśra was My father."
